name: Introduction to History
description: A basic introduction to the study of history, covering topics such as the nature of historical knowledge, historiography, and the methods of historical research.

name: Foundations of Diplomatic History
description: This course explores the international relations of the past, including the diplomatic strategies of states and the role of the international system in shaping historical events.

name: Diplomatic History of the 19th Century
description: This course explores the diplomatic history of the 19th century, focusing on topics such as the rise of the great powers, European imperialism, and the emergence of the modern international system.

name: Diplomatic History of the 20th Century
description: This course explores the diplomatic history of the 20th century, focusing on topics such as the world wars, the Cold War, decolonization, and the rise of global governance.

name: Topics in Diplomatic History
description: This course explores a variety of topics in diplomatic history, such as the history of international law, the history of international organizations, and the history of diplomacy.
